Posts.Content: Oct 23, 2007 07:49AM Savgirl wrote: I had bilat with expanders and was told to do NOTHING with my arms for the first few weeks.  Then, I was allowed to do the stretching exercises which were prescribed.  I remember thinking I would never regain my range of motion, but I just did the exercises several times each day and also when I was in the shower.  I used a little booklet which came in a pile of reading material from the American Cancer society.  The booklet had many exercises in it and was very helpful.  I think it's called Exercises After Breast Surgery.  It's free if you ask for it at your local office.  I was able to play competitive tennis which requires overhead arm movement after 7 to 8 weeks.  Good luck.
Posts.Title: How Long to Regain Arm Mobility? Reader Zelda
